items.sentence: We didn\'t have computers when I was growing up.
There are a lot of patients in the waiting room.
I\'m the one who advised Tom to stop doing that.
Tom isn\'t as easy to get along with as you are.
I thought you said you knew how to speak French.
Tom thinks I\'m always putting myself in danger.
I wasn\'t surprised when Tom told me about that.
Why didn\'t you tell me Tom was in the hospital?
Why don\'t you come in and have a cup of coffee?
Tom and Mary were both shocked by what John did.
